snippet: WEINER--Walter H. The Trustees and staff of the Museum of Jewish Heritage - A Living Memorial to the Holocaust express profound sadness on the passing of Life Trustee Walter H. Weiner who was dedicated to the Museum's mission since its early years. Walter was an esteemed leader of numerous committees and a champion of Museum affiliates, JewishGen and the Auschwitz Jewish Center. We send our condolences to his wife, Nina, and to their entire family. Bruce C. Ratner, Chairman Elissa Schein, Deputy Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEINER--Walter H. The Trustees and staff of the Museum of Jewish Heritage - A Living Memorial to the Holocaust express profound sadness on the passing of Life Trustee Walter H. Weiner who was dedicated to the Museum's mission since its early years. Walter was an esteemed leader of numerous committees and a champion of Museum affiliates, JewishGen and the Auschwitz Jewish Center. We send our condolences to his wife, Nina, and to their entire family. Bruce C. Ratner, Chairman Elissa Schein, Deputy Director 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEINER, WALTER H
